phrases: A dream...
Right?
Were you holding back today?
No.
You did not seem as hard on me as you did yesterday.
Because your abilities have improved.
They have?
Specifically, your stance no longer has any wasted movement.
Really?
I was only mimicking his moves...
So you are using Archer's technique, not mine, as the basis for your study.
You can tell that?
Of course.
After all, you had no fundamental stance at the start.
I am sorry...
I did not mean it as a slight against you, Saber.
I guess he was in my head because I was around him all day yesterday.
There is no need to apologize.
If Archer's style is a better fit for you, it is not my place to judge.
Um, Saber...
Good morning.
Hey, how rare to see you late.
Fujimura-sensei was quite furious.
Finally gracing us with your presence?
Shinji...
You let it go to your head, and now you think you are hot stuff?
Still, I am glad you came.
If you were not here, it would not be any fun.
What is up?
Not going to the cafeteria?
I should like nothing better, but...
Well, just have a look at that.
There can be no doubt.
That girl is peeking into our classroom, nonchalant, yet brazen as can be.
It is not The one you wait for will not come, but The one you wait for will not notice.
She looks about to snap, like one who had left a birthday gift for someone,
but even after a year, the recipient failed to notice.
Where are you going, Tohsaka?
It is lunchtime, so obviously, I am going to eat lunch.
Oh, right.
Well, find a nice spot.
I am eating in the student council office.
Wait just a minute!
What, did you forget your lunch money or something?
I can share my lunch with you if
Of course I did not, you numbskull!
Over there, you will be sitting in the wind.
Sorry.
About yesterday, I mean.
I have used a Command Seal on Archer.
I ordered him not to attack you, as long as our alliance stands.
I know it does not make up for anything, but I am sorry.
That is not something you should be apologizing for.
I gave him free rein yesterday, so I am responsible.
Okay.
If that is what you say, I will go along with it.
Besides, I was partly to blame, and if he had not been there, I...
Let us call it even.
Yeah.
So where is Archer today?
I left him at home.
Oh.
Crap, lunch break is over!
Hang out with me for a bit.
Skipping a class every once in a while will not do any harm, right?
Why are you so fixated on strengthening magic?
I have tried different kinds, but that is the only one I can do.
I can store up simple power, alter its flow,
and convert and store mana in various objects.
Should you be telling me this?
You told me yours, so it would not be fair if I did not.
I showed you earlier, but this is my Magic Crest.
In the Tohsaka family, we pass down conversion techniques.
Our specialty is the transfer of power, either in ourselves or in others.
Did you know that the Matous are a mage family?
Yes.
But Father told me that they are no longer considered a bloodline of mages.
Wait a second!
You knew that Shinji was a Master?
I am sorry...
I just found out this morning.
I would written him off as someone who could not possibly be a Master.
What are you going to do about him?
Attack him right away?
I would not attack someone haphazardly just because he is a Master.
Actually, you did...
You attacked me.
I only did because you were not taking this seriously.
It was an exceptional exception!
Anyway, our enemy is the Master who is hiding at the school.
For now, let us focus on them.
Then you are saying there are four here, at school?
Would not there have to be?
As a Master, Shinji has no power.
I told him I would turn a blind eye if he behaved himself,
so I do not expect any trouble from him.
Wait, Tohsaka...
Tell me more about that.
Shinji was the one who approached me.
He said, Since we are both Masters, shall we join forces?
Naturally, I turned him down, but he would not take no for an answer.
So finally, I said, I already have Emiya-kun, so I do not need you.
Right to his face!
So that is why he was acting strangely...
Well, what is the plan, Tohsaka?
Shinji might not be a mage, but he did put up that field.
You did not notice that?
Oh, no.
If we are not careful, Shinji might...
That is great!
This is how Servants ought to be!
What is going on?
Keep generating mana within your body, Emiya-kun.
Sakura!
Wai
She is breathing.
It is not too late to save them.
We have to find Shinji and take down this field.
Emiya-kun!
What are these things?
Golems.
A type of familiar!
I will summon Saber.
You used a Command Seal yesterday, right?
That means it is my turn.
Emiya-kun...
Please...
Come to me,
Saber!
Saber!
I have come in response to your summons.
Master, the situation?
It is as you can see.
A Servant has set up a Bounded Field.
I want to dismantle it as quickly as possible.
Archer, do you hear me?
I sense the presence of a Servant on this floor.
No way!
Here?
Rin?
No, if that is what you sense, I am sure you are right.
But I sense the field's point of origin on the first floor.
The Servant's on this floor, even though the field is coming from the first?
I cannot say for sure, but that is what I sense.
Rin, where is Archer?
If he is here, he can give a better assessment.
I am calling him, but he is not answering!
This Bounded Field cuts us off from the outside world.
A Command Seal is the only form of contact that can get through.
We should consider this a field designed to separate Master from Servant.
The enemy is planning to settle things here, Shirou.
Saber, there is a Servant on this floor, right?
You handle that one.
We are going to destroy the Bounded Field.
Emiya-kun?
It is dangerous, but that is the correct decision.
Now, while I keep them busy.
Thanks.
Let us go, Tohsaka.
Damn it!
Chemistry Room
Very good.
This is how a first-rate Master does things.
Once this is over, maybe I will go check out Emiya's withered husk.
What is it, Rider?
Hey, what is the deal?
How are you able to move?
Stay away, damn it...
I am warning you, you would better stay away!
What the hell?
Rider!
Rider-class Servant...
Caster...
Tohsaka, did you locate the field's point of origin?
Yes, it is right over there.
Chemistry Room
That room up ahead!
Damn, they are persistent!
Are we ever going to run out of these guys?
Shirou, stand back.
Ein Korper
ist ein
Korper!
Shinji...
Do not give me any of your excuses.
I will make you pay for what you have done, no matter what!
Y-You have got it wrong!
Wrong!
Wrong!
It was not me...
It was not me!
It was not me!
It was not you?
Take this field down right now!
If you say no, I will blow your sniveling face clean off!
I am telling you, you have got it wrong!
It was not me!
She was killed by
Shinji!
Ouch, ouch...
Tohsaka!
Tohsaka, over there.
She is dead.
Looks like you survived by allowing your Servant to be killed.
But if you saw the killer's face, it will be your turn next.
Th-That will not happen!
I do not have a Servant!
I am not a Master anymore...
You two are the ones who still have targets on your backs!
That is true.
Even if you still have Command Seals, you are no threat.
Gnats cannot kill anyone.
G-Gnats?
You are calling me a gnat?
Be glad I am not comparing you to a harmful bug!
If you saw who did it, answer me.
Right now, that is your only value to us.
Talk!
What kind of Servant was it that took out yours?
H-How should I know, moron?!
Y-You are the ones who should be scared...
Because you are the ones it will come after next!
It is okay, Tohsaka.
They are all still breathing.
They are breathing?
Yeah, they are alive.
All we have to do is call for help.
With something like this, do they need an ambulance?
Or should we call...
We should call the church.
If we explain the situation to Kirei, he will see to everything.
Okay.
I will call him right away, then.
You were fighting Caster?
Yes, although it was merely Caster's shadow that controlled the familiars.
I see.
Then the real Caster has not left Ryuudou Temple.
Knowing her, she might have manipulated Shinji, to lure Rider into a trap.
Then Rider was killed through deception?
Crap.
Still, we know that Caster's Master is someone at this school.
Right...
Tohsaka, if you have something to say, say it.
Emiya-kun, you are really level-headed.
I was surprised.
I was not calm.
I was probably so pissed, I lost control.
Even so, you knew the extent of everyone is injuries.
I could not manage that.
It was not a big deal.
I am used to seeing dead bodies.
Used to it?
I will find out whether or not he is a Master.
Anyone who is not up for this battle should just leave.
And you call yourself a hero?
Then you are saying that you are prepared to fight?
Next Time The Distance Between Them
